front.title: SAMLv2 Lightweight Web Browser SSO Profile

abstract.t: This document specifies a SAMLv2 lightweight Web Browser Single Sign-On Profile. This profile is modeled on the OASIS SAMLv2 Web Browser SSO profile, adding various constraints, and using a new lightweight SAMLv2 HTTP POST binding which does not rely on XML Digital Signature -- relying on a more simple-to-implement signature approach instead.
